description: Details of Landscape Maintenance pursuant to Condition 16  of Planning Permission ref P/2007/5237 dated 3/7/8 for " Demolition of swimming pool and police station and erection of part single and two storey leisure and community building containing 25 metre 8 lane swimming pool, learners pool , fitness suite with dance studio, library, cafe, police station, community facilities with ancillary offices, plant and changing facilities, erection of single storey district heating system/store/bin store building, provision of 64 car parking space, including 4 disabled spaces and 2 police spaces, served by new vehicular access off Eastcote Lane North, alterations to form coach/disabled drop off area on frontage, bicycle parking and landscaping, including the provision of hardsurfacing, paths and seating on open space adjacent to Mandeville Road and Eastcote Lane North junction"
